avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow in mountains can be unstable. Older snow is considered stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow on Saturday and Sunday and new snow expected on Monday. Older snow is considered stable but. The new snow could get unstable when it gets warmer on Tuesday and in the sunshine. Were it accumulates, especially high in mountains, thin unstable slabs can form. Only small avalanches are expected.

travelAdvisory.comment: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snjóar töluvert í A- á mánudag en rigning á láglendi og neðantil í fjöllum. Snýst í SV-átt seint á mánudagskvöld. Hýnar á þriðjudag, smávegis skúrir en snjókoma í hæstu fjöll. A-átt og rigning á miðvikudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Wet slab in Naustahvilft 19th of March.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow in mountains can be unstable especially when it gets warmer on Tuesday. Older snow is considered stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow on Saturday in light SW-wind on Sunday in W-wind. Older snow is expected to be stable but. The new snow could be unstable where it accumulates. The snow can get less stable when it gets warmer on Tuesday. Only small avalanches are expected.

travelAdvisory.comment: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Smávegis snjókoma á mánudagskvöld og aðfaranótt þriðjudags í hægri A-átt. Snýst í SV-átt á þriðjudag og hlýnar skúrir en snjókoma til fjalla. Snýst í hvassa NA-átt á miðvikudag með rigningu en snjókomu til fjalla.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Some new snow is in the area and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Snow has settled in recent days, but older wind slabs might still remain at higher elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It has snowed a bit in the area, on top of the old snow which was considered mostly stable. Small slabs could form on most aspects. Some old wind slabs could be present in gullies and depressions at higher elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Breytilegar áttir og snjókoma með köflum.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Little or no snow at low elevations and hard packed snow in the mountains with a thin cover of new snow. Softer snow is present in ravines and depressions.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Little or no snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains with a thin cover of new snow. Snow is considered mostly stable. The new snow could drift to southeasterly aspects. Small sluffs could release in the sun on Tuesday.

travelAdvisory.comment: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Breytilegar áttir næstu daga og dálítil snjókoma á mánudag.
